exclude.description: A list of regular expressions that will be ignored when searching for files.

watch.description: Watch for changes to the source files and restart the tests once a change is detected.

poll.description: The time in milliseconds to wait between checking the watched folder for file changes.

aggregateTimeout.description: The time in milliseconds to wait for more changes before emitting a change event.

ignored.description: A list of regular expressions for files to ignore when watching for changes.
